name: Omicron (itch)
description:
Omicron is a project I started a long time ago. I Always wanted to make a Minecraft-like game but I always struggled to do it properly. It's now been one year that Omicron is in semi-active developpement. Don't expect much :D

You can find everything you need to know more about this game on the Following webpages:

  • https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?f=55&t=20478&p=325592#p325348
  • https://github.com/azekillDIABLO/omicron
  • https://discordapp.com/channels/507201646774976522/507201646774976524

Download is available on the links above!

(screenshots may be a bit outdated on some details, for example font or debug text)
